title: NASA to launch new rover and helicopter for Mars mission
description: The Ingenuity helicopter will investigate Mars’ atmosphere and the Perseverance rover will explore its surface, where scientists hope to find signs of microbial life that may have once existed on the planet.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Michael Phelps speaks out on mental health struggles during pandemic
description: During the week when the 2020 Tokyo Olympics were supposed to be underway, Michael Phelps opens up to Kate Snow about the mental health struggles he and other athletes have faced both during the Olympics and the pandemic.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Mass starvation predicted due to economic effects of pandemic
description: Four UN agencies say that the 140 million people globally on the brink of starvation may rise to 270 million this year, with children being the most impacted.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Photo shows Biden’s talking points on Harris ahead of VP announcement
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden says he’ll make a choice on his running mate next week, though a photo of his notes showed he was prepared to defend Senator Kamala Harris as a contender, if asked.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Atlanta pays respects to late Congressman John Lewis
description: A procession brought John Lewis’ body to important personal landmarks across Atlanta, ending at the Georgia State Capitol, where hundreds of people waited for a turn to honor the civil rights icon’s legacy.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Apple, Amazon, Facebook and Google CEOs grilled at House antitrust hearing
description: Four of the world’s most powerful tech CEOs appeared virtually before Congress to face questions about whether they have too much power. In his first time testifying, Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos was asked whether his company uses third-party seller data to develop …
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: NYPD arrest of protester using unmarked van draws Portland parallels
description: A young protester was grabbed by NYPD officers in plainclothes and forced into an unmarked van, drawing outrage from other demonstrators and comparisons to actions taken by federal agents in Portland.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Rep. Gohmert, who has refused to wear a mask until recently, tests positive for COVID-19
description: Republican Rep. Louie Gohmert had planned to travel on Air Force One with President Trump during his trip to Texas, then Gohmert — who has refused to wear a mask in the past — tested positive for coronavirus.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Signs show emerging coronavirus outbreaks in more states
description: States like Ohio, Indiana, Kentucky and Tennessee, which have so far avoided the worst of the pandemic, are seeing signs of new outbreaks. Florida and California, still experiencing the worst of the surge, reported new single day records for fatalities.
source.name: NBC News

author: Tim Stelloh and Variety
title: Malik B., founding member of The Roots, dies at 47
description: Malik Abdul Basit, a Philadelphia hip hop vocalist and early member of The Roots, has died, the group announced Wednesday. He was 47.
content:
Malik Abdul Basit, a Philadelphia hip hop vocalist and early member of The Roots, has died, the group announced Wednesday. He was 47.
